Basic_critic

Source: R/GAN.R
basic_critic.Rd

A basic critic for images `n_channels` x `in_size` x `in_size`.

basic_critic(
  in_size,
  n_channels,
  n_features = 64,
  n_extra_layers = 0,
  norm_type = 1,
  bias = NULL,
  ndim = 2,
  bn_1st = TRUE,
  act_cls = nn$ReLU,
  transpose = FALSE,
  xtra = NULL,
  bias_std = 0.01,
  dilation = 1,
  groups = 1,
  padding_mode = "zeros",
  ...
)

Arguments

in_size

in_size
n_channels

The number of channels
n_features

The number of features
n_extra_layers

The number of extra layers
norm_type

norm_type
bias

bias
ndim

ndim
bn_1st

bn_1st
act_cls

act_cls
transpose

transpose
xtra

xtra
bias_std

bias_std
dilation

dilation
groups

groups
padding_mode

Mode of padding
...

additional parameters to pass
